title: Simplify
speech: 3 x minus 6, is greater than or equal to, 0 , then  3 x is greater than or equal to, 6 , so  x, is greater than or equal to 2 , then  3 x, is less than 6 , so  x, is less than 2 .

title: Answer
speech: 12 x minus 24  if  x is greater than or equal to 2  and  negative 12 times x plus 24  if  x is less than 2
